name: Cuber (NinjaBoy1010)
description: This is just a small game I made, it's not that good, but it's a start :/ Hope anyone who stumbles across this likes it! (And yes, I used a tutorial and modified it.)  Please do keep in mind that this game IS in development, so to restart, you have to close and relaunch the game, but do not worry, this will be fixed soon. Plus at the end there's a surprise! (well, kinda).
